FAQ / Wave 2 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Predacon Headstrong - Ground Assault

  1. If you have a Stealthiness attached to Headstrong in his Alternate Mode, what happens? Does Brave trump the Stealth or vice versa? [Source: WotC]
    The opponent can choose to attack any available target; they essentially cancel each other out.
